Description_lang: Infects an enemy with a malevolent plague that will kill its host if unable to spread. After $t1 sec, the Plague will infect all players within 8 yards, dealing $72864s1 Nature damage. If the target fails to infect anyone, the host's rapid death will follow.
AuraDescription_lang: Infects allies within 8 yards upon expiration, also dealing $72864s1 Nature damage.If the Plague does not find a new host, it |cFFFF0000KILLS|r you.
